definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: The manufacturer shall provide the factory quality certification and factory check out report with testing data.
sentences.chinese: 供應商提供的出廠合格證書和廠內試驗報告。

sentences.english: You must do sport and keep healthy.
sentences.chinese: 你應該進行合格證活動，保持身體健康。

sentences.english: Certificate of acceptance of contract product quality signed by both parties in two copies.
sentences.chinese: 由雙方簽署的合同產品考覈驗收合格證書一式兩份。

sentences.english: She was granted an examination certificate.
sentences.chinese: 她被授予了考試合格證書。

sentences.english: He has got a qualification for saling.
He has got the qualification for opening a pub.
sentences.chinese: 他弄到了開酒吧的合格證。

sentences.english: And achieved a national home inspection organizations that explosion-proof certificate issued.
sentences.chinese: 且均取得了國家指家的檢驗機構頒發的防爆合格證。

sentences.english: You'll be taking chances challenging the quality of the certified cereal.
sentences.chinese: 質疑那種有合格證的麥片的質量，你就是在冒險。

sentences.english: Third, examine the safety inspection certificate issued by public security organs.
sentences.chinese: 三查是否有公安部門的安全檢測合格證書。

sentences.english: Whole set packing contains quality certificate, specification card, warranty card.
sentences.chinese: 全套包裝，帶合格證，說明書，保修卡。

sentences.english: Product quality supervision and inspection certificate, the standard implementation of the certificate.
sentences.chinese: 產品質量監督檢查合格證書，標準執行證書。

sentences.english: I have received a UG Engineer's Qualification Certificate and a driver's license.
sentences.chinese: 我已經取得了UG工程師合格證書還有駕駛執照。

sentences.english: A veterinary drug that leaves the manufacturing plant shall bear a certificate of quality.
sentences.chinese: 獸藥出廠應當附有產品質量合格證。

sentences.english: I've got SET certificate of A level.
sentences.chinese: 我有口語考試的A級合格證。

sentences.english: Obtained more than ten single section qualified certificates also, with the credit corresponded.
sentences.chinese: 並取得了十幾門單科合格證書，和相應的學分。

sentences.english: Suspension Service is only applicable to Qualified Certificates.
sentences.chinese: 中止服務僅適用於合格證書。

definition: (international trade) documentation (e.g. a bill of lading)
environmental impact assessment EIA/abbr. to 環評|环评
